DOC.brief_summary: This trial conduct Europe . The aim trial investigate pharmacodynamic ( effect investigate drug body ) response Faster act insulin aspart ( FIAsp ) subject type 1 diabetes .
DOC.brief_title: A Trial Investigating Pharmacodynamic Response Faster Acting Insulin Aspart Subjects With Type 1 Diabetes
DOC.mesh_term: Insulin degludec , insulin aspart drug combination
DOC.criteria: Male female age 1864 year ( inclusive ) time sign informed consent Type 1 diabetes mellitus ( diagnose clinically ) least 12 month Body mass index 18.528.0 kg/m^2 ( inclusive ) Subject donate blood plasma past month 500 mL within 3 month prior screen Smoker ( define subject smoking least one cigarette , cigar pipe daily ) Not able willing refrain smoking use nicotine substitute product inpatient period
